body:
Comment 8: 
Hi Skip,

I just tried your test case on my ARM5 system, a Netgear Stora which uses a very similar
CPU to the Sheevaplug (it might even be the same).

axentraserver(~/devel) % 5g bitebyte.go 
axentraserver(~/devel) % 5l bitebyte.5
axentraserver(~/devel) % ./5.out 
71 111 111 103 108 101
71 111 111 103 108 101
axentraserver(~/devel) % cat /proc/cpuinfo 
Processor       : ARM926EJ-S rev 1 (v5l)
BogoMIPS        : 992.87
Features        : swp half thumb fastmult edsp 
CPU implementer : 0x56
CPU architecture: 5TE
CPU variant     : 0x2
CPU part        : 0x131
CPU revision    : 1
Cache type      : write-back
Cache clean     : cp15 c7 ops
Cache lockdown  : format C
Cache format    : Harvard
I size          : 16384
I assoc         : 4
I line length   : 32
I sets          : 128
D size          : 16384
D assoc         : 4
D line length   : 32
D sets          : 128

Hardware        : Feroceon-KW
Revision        : 0000
Serial          : 0000000000000000
